name: Burter's Golden Butter Gun
description:
Best played in Full-screen!

📱PLAY ACROSS MULTIPLE PLATFORMS!🖥️

The BurterButterBeans logo comes alive 😱👻 in this top-down, action RPG, Golden-gun shooter 🔫! Experience nostalgia from some of your favorite games 📺, including and most relevant: Goldeneye 007 (N64), Super Smash Bros Ultimate (Nintendo Switch), Super Mario World (SNES), Pacman (NES), Kirby, and Kingdom Hearts! 💖🎮 Play as Burter, a snowboarder equipped with a gun made of Butter. Take down criminal bosses, as you face them for rematches for having lost in the past. Learn the unique boss patterns to defeat them all! Enjoy this homage to some of the best titles, and thank you Wonderjam for this wonderful opportunity! 😊

--

Submission for Wonderjam #4 https://itch.io/jam/wonderjam-4
